publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: Seianus his fall. VVritten by Ben: Ionson
monogr.author: Jonson, Ben

div.head: THE ARGVMENT.
div.p: This do we aduance as a marke of Terror to all Traytors, & Treasons; to shewe how iust the Heauens are in powring and thundring downe a weighty vengeance on their vnnatural intents, euen to the worst Princes: Much more to those, for guard of whose Piety and Vertue, the Angels are in continuall watch, and God himselfe miraculously working.
